```{r}
alarm_report <- data.frame(date = c("2020-03-14", "2020-03-15", "2020-04-10", "2020-04-18"), building = c("Engineering-North", "Bren Hall", "Engineering-South", "Engr-North"), alarm_message = 
                             c("10:02am -- HVAC system down, facilities management alerted","8:24am -- Elevator North out of service", "12:41am -- Fire alarm, UCSB fire responded and cleared", "9:58pm -- Campus point emergency siren, UCPD responded" ))

str(alarm_report)

levels(factor(alarm_report$building))

alarm_report %>% mutate(building = recode(building,"Engr-North" = "Engineering-North")) %>% 

# separate the building column into two separate columns, building and wing, separated at the dash
tidyr::separate(building, c("building", "wing"), "-") %>%
# Only keep observations with the word “responded” in the alarm_message column
filter(str_detect(alarm_message, "responded")) %>% 
  mutate(date = lubridate::ymd(date))



```
